description:
Job Title: Packing/Shipping Associate

Shift: 7:00 AM - 3:30 PM (8-hour shift)

Pay: $19-$21

Overview

We are seeking a reliable and detail-oriented Packing/Shipping Associate to support our client in the Aerospace Industry. The ideal candidate will have basic computer skills and experience in inventory Shipping & Receiving as well as Inventory managment. This role is crucial to ensuring our products are accurately packed and shipped to our customers in a timely manner.

Responsibilities

  • Pack and prepare products for shipment according to company standards and customer requirements.
  • Ensure accurate labeling and documentation of all outgoing shipments.
  • Utilize basic computer skills for data entry and inventory management tasks.
  • Assist in managing inventory, including receiving, counting, and organizing products.
  • Maintain a clean and organized work area.
  • Collaborate with team members to meet daily shipping and packing goals.
  • Follow safety protocols and guidelines to ensure a safe working environment.

Qualifications

  • High school diploma or equivalent.
  • Some computer skills, including familiarity with inventory management software or similar systems.
  • Previous experience or exposure to inventory management is preferred.
  • Strong attention to detail and organizational skills.
  • Ability to lift and move packages up to 30 pounds.
  • Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
  • Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and meet deadlines.
